mapper.select: SELECT b.bin_id, b.bin_code, b.zone, b.aisle, b.row_num, b.floor, b.amount, l.lot_id, l.lot_number, l.product_id, l.status, l.inbound_id, l.outbound_id, p.product_code, p.product_name FROM bin b LEFT JOIN lot l ON b.bin_id = l.bin_id LEFT JOIN product p ON l.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT bin_id FROM bin WHERE zone = #{zone} ORDER BY row ASC, floor ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT bin_id FROM bin WHERE bin_code LIKE CONCAT(#{binPrefix}, '-%') ORDER BY bin_code ASC
